trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a decoder fallback operation fails.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.DecoderFallbackException"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Exception.HResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this exception is set to COR_E_ARGUMENT (0x80070057).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.DecoderFallbackException"></xref> class.
A parameter specifies the error message.
The <xref:System.Exception.HResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this exception is set to COR_E_ARGUMENT (0x80070057).
An error message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.DecoderFallbackException"></xref> class.
Parameters specify the error message and the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
The <xref:System.Exception.HResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this exception is set to COR_E_ARGUMENT (0x80070057).
An error message.
The exception that caused this exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.DecoderFallbackException"></xref> class.
Parameters specify the error message, the array of bytes being decoded, and the index of the byte that cannot be decoded.
The <xref:System.Exception.HResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this exception is set to COR_E_ARGUMENT (0x80070057).
An error message.
The input byte array.
The index position in bytesUnknown of the byte that cannot be decoded.
Gets the input byte sequence that caused the exception.
The application uses the <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.Index%2A> property to get the position in the input byte array of the byte that cannot be decoded.
The input byte array that cannot be decoded.
Gets the index position in the input byte sequence of the byte that caused the exception.
The application uses the <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.BytesUnknown%2A> property to retrieve the input byte array that contains the byte that cannot be decoded.
The index position in the input byte array of the byte that cannot be decoded.
The index position is zero-based.
